program atcoder_e
  implicit none
  integer :: i,j,t
  integer :: N, T
  integer, allocatable :: AB(:,:), dp(:,:), indices(:)
  integer :: max_value

  ! Read N and T
  read*, N, T

  ! Allocate AB array [1..N][1..2]
  allocate(AB(N,2))
  do i =1, N
    read*, AB(i, 1), AB(i,2)
  end do

  ! Allocate indices array [1..N]
  allocate(indices(N))
  allocate( indices(N) )

  ! create indices array 1..N, then sort by AB(row,1)
  call sort_indices( AB, indices, N )

  ! Now indices contains the sorted indices

  ! Initialize DP array
  allocate( dp(0:N,0:6000) )
  dp =0 ! set all to zero

  ! DP setup:
  do i =1, N
    do time_after_eat =0,6000
       ! current index is indices(i)
       ! get the values:
       current_row = indices(i)
       a_time = AB( current_row, 1 )
       a_value = AB( current_row, 2 )
       ! wait, but need variables computed before the loop? Or in the loop.

       ! now do the previous step: why compute here. 

       wait in any case, need to have a_time and a_value for current item.
       Therefore:

       current_row= indices(i)
       a_time= AB(current_row,1)
       a_value=AB(current_row,2)

       ! the first step in loops for the DP: compare with previous row
       if ( dp(i, time_after_eat) < dp(i-1, time_after_eat) ) then
          dp(i, time_after_eat) = dp(i-1, time_after_eat)
       end if

       ! check if it's possible to take this item
       if ( time_after_eat >= a_time .and. (time_after_eat - a_time) < T ) then

          possible_val = dp(i-1, time_after_eat - a_time ) + a_value

          if ( possible_val > dp(i, time_after_eat) ) then
              dp(i, time_after_eat) = possible_val
          end if
       end if
    end do

  end do

  max_value = maxval( dp(N, 0:6000) )

  print*, max_value

  deallocate( AB, indices, dp )

contains

  subroutine sort_indices( AB, indices, N )
    integer, intent(in)      :: AB(N,2)
    integer, intent(inout)   :: indices(N)
    integer, intent(in)      :: N
    ! Sort indices based on AB's first column
    integer :: i,j, temp
    logical :: swapped

    ! Initialize indices
    do i =1,N
       indices(i) = i
    end do

    ! do bubble sort
    do
       swapped = .false.
       do i=1,N-1
          if( AB( indices(i), 1 ) > AB( indices(i+1),1 ) ) then
             temp = indices(i)
             indices(i) = indices(i+1)
             indices(i+1) = temp
             swapped = .true.
          end if
       end do
       if( .not. swapped ) exit
    end do

  end subroutine sort_indices

end program atcoder_e
